name: PSYKE
description:
PSYKE is a bizarre horror platformer puzzle game. Tunnel through your mind as you try to cope with your sanity slipping away. Forever followed (and perhaps guided?) by the ghastly presence of a dead friend.

-CONTROLS-

A + D - Move left and right.
W - Jump
E - Interact
R - Restart Level
Mouse Click (Hold) - Break blocks to tunnel through level.
ENTER - Skip cutsenes

----------------------------------------

Created in 48 hours for Alberta Game Jam #1. 23-25 August 2019.
Theme: What Lies Below
----------------------------------------

Code and gameplay by KIRIRRAS
Artwork and story by GAIAN HELMERS
Music by SEBASTIAN SOBIESKI
